name: GetEmailAddressDomainSuggestions
description:
This service returns a list of the most likely email address domains (so 'gmail.com', 'hotmail.com', etc) based on
your current context.

properties.name: MaxSuggestions
properties.description: The number of suggestions to return. Defaults to 5 and is limited to 10.

properties.name: Domains
properties.description: A list of the domain names, ordered by usage count. Each domain is returned in the form of `domain.tld`.
